snippet: A group of friends decided to grow old together 20 years ago, and today they say their experiment in communal living has had its rewards but is not for the stubborn.
abstract: Members gather in Mendocino County, Calif, to celebrate 20th anniversary of Cheesecake community, founded in 1993 as experimental in communal living based on idea that no one should grow old alone; complex's permanent members occupy three buildings comprised of private bedrooms and shared living spaces.
lead_paragraph: A group of friends decided to grow old together 20 years ago, and today they say their experiment in communal living has had its rewards but is not for the stubborn.

headline.main: Till Death (or Decorating Disputes) Do Us Part
headline.print_headline: Till Death (or Decorating Disputes) Do Us Part
